ing: 1 (10 inch) prepared graham cracker pie crust
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Very easy, very good, light Key lime taste that still makes you pucker. Took me a while to perfect this one. No baking, no fuss - takes me 10 or 15 minutes to make."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together condensed milk and lime juice. Fold in whipped topping and mix until smooth. Pour mixture into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
